duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and maintain enterprise integration processes using Oracle Integration Cloud (OIC) or similar tools such as Mulesoft or Boomi.
Collaborate with stakeholders to gather integration requirements and design scalable solutions.
Implement and configure middleware integration to enable seamless communication between enterprise systems.
Troubleshoot and resolve issues related to data exchange and system integration.
Document integration processes, including specifications, test plans, and deployment procedures.
Provide technical support and guidance to the development team on integration best practices.
Stay updated with the latest trends and advancements in enterprise integration technologies.
